data.name: GravityPunk
data.detailed_description:
In 9527, After the home planet Altas was destroyed, the mother ship Zero arrived at the disintegrated planetary factory. The last biochemical robot Azero on the ship will board the Tower of Creation and embark on the road to restart civilization...

[Unique gameplay]
This may be the first game in the world that can freely rotate the space.

[The Ability to Manipulate Space]
You can rotate the space clockwise or counterclockwise to avoid obstacles and find the way forward.

[Physics Puzzle]
You can use your bounce ability and skills to pave the way for new paths.

[Random map]
Randomly combine and generate maps each time, as well as seamless map links.

data.short_description: This is a platform jumping game with unique gameplay. In the world of punk, you can control and rotate space, but you can never escape the shackles of gravity. Explore secrets, and find out the truth. Release your soul bound by gravity.
